title: Idea: opennig http/https in external OS browser
author: jackmoscow
body_snippet:
Is it possible to implement the possibility of using an external OS browser? (HTTP/HTTPS protocols) 
Default or which could be selected manually

## Expected Behavior
Make it possible to select the OS browser (default or another installed in the OS)

## Current Behavior
At the moment http/https opens in the built-in program, the connection does not always occur, especially if self-signed certificates are used

Which Version of mRemoteNG are you using? 

Starting with 1.77 (please try out the nightly build) it should use Chromium as base which uses the Builtin Windows Certificate Store, previously it was something Firefox-Based with the option to use IE which caused some trouble (see #1842).
